title: i got a championship 2016 riven skin from the loot , why i cant use it ????!  HELP!
body: {{champion:92}} championship 2016 riven skin is my favorate , i got it feom the loot tonight , but when i pick cham, i cant use the skin , it shows i dont own it ,   but in collection it shows i own ...... i restarted the game and also me pc couples time , didnt fix .......HELP !!!!!!!!!!!! whats going on here ???!

replies.body: Make sure you are selecting the correct skin if you have it unlocked, there are 2 versions of the Championship Riven skin.  One is the original limited skin and another is the new one that has 2016 in the title.

When you receive something from hextech boxes, the shard goes into your inventory until you activate it. While it _is_ in your inventory, it's not unlocked for use in games until you activate it using orange essence. 

You can check out our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for all the details on crafting!
